amendment.description: Amendment shorten the time requirement of the publication of rules of the Department of Housing and Urban Development Community Development Fund from 90 days to 14 days.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part C of House Report 116-51 to shorten the time requirement of the publication of rules of the Department of Housing and Urban Development Community Development Fund in Public Law 115-123.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fletcher amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 393 - 20 (Roll no. 200).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mrs. Fletcher.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fletcher amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 393 - 20 (Roll no. 200).
